articles.title: Mayotte: French island territory hit by Cyclone Chido - BBC.com
articles.description: There are reports of severe damage on the French Indian Ocean territory after it was struck by Cyclone Chido.
articles.content:
France's Indian Ocean territory of Mayotte has been struck by the worst cyclone to hit the islands in nearly a century.
At least 11 people were reportedly killed when Cyclone Chido made landfall on … [+3383 chars]
